snippet.title: Season 15: Honor & Glory Official Trailer | Overwatch 2
snippet.description:
Fortune favors the bold in Season 15: Honor & Glory!

Take your gameplay to the next level with Perks - Overwatch 2’s dynamic new mid-match upgrade system for Quick Play and Competitive. Choose Minor Perks for small boosts and Major Perks for game-changing abilities that can turn the tide of any team fight.

The 2025 Competitive Year is here, bringing with it a fresh rank reset and stellar new rewards with Galactic Weapons.

Season 15’s Premium Battle Pass is packed with even more rewards including 80 Mythic Prisms for unlocking Mythic Pixiu Zenyatta, tons of new Legendary Skins, and the long-awaited return of Loot Boxes!

Enjoy the return of Overwatch Classic with the GOATS Meta, brand new Shop Skins, earnable Rainy Day Skins, and SO. MUCH. MORE.

Honor, glory, and victory await you when Season 15 launches Feb 18!

Overwatch 2 is free to play for everyone on console & PC!
_
Follow #Overwatch2 for the latest news:
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/playoverwatch
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@overwatch
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/playoverwatch 
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/playoverwatch
